aom.scripting.xs.kb

Class Escrow

  • Object
    • Escrow

  • public class Escrow
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of KB commands concerning Escrows. Escrows are used by the AI to seperate the available resources in virtual slices. Each of those slices can be used for its own goals. Typically, an AI will have 3 escrows: a root escrow, an economic escrow and a military escrow.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      bool kbEscrowAllocateCurrentResources()

      Destroys an escrow.
      bool kbEscrowFlush(int escrowID, int resourceID, bool flushChildren)
      Removes all credits (and puts them into the root escrow) of the given resource type from the given escrow.
      float kbEscrowGetAmount(int escrowID, int resourceID)
      Returns the amount of credits in the given escrow for the given resource.

      Returns the ID of the named escrow.
